item.title: Reviving Bullnose Cabover Truck After 30 Years!
item.description: A classic Bullnose cabover is inspected, repaired, and brought back to life after decades of sitting untouched. Will the old truck run again?

media:content.media:title: Reviving Bullnose Cabover Truck After 30 Years!
media:content.media:description: A classic Bullnose cabover is inspected, repaired, and brought back to life after decades of sitting untouched. Will the old truck run again?

item.title: Restoring an Old Bruin 10
item.description: A step-by-step look at bringing a Bruin 10 back into working condition, from inspection to careful repairs and final testing. How well does it run after the revival?

item.title: Recovering a Dozer from the Swamp
item.description: The team works through mud, water, and tight spaces to safely recover a dozer stuck deep in a swamp, using careful planning and steady teamwork. Will the machine make it out?

item.description: Twin Granddaughters Construct a Handmade Weapon

item.description: This tow truck was left in a field!

item.title: Exploring a K10 Squarebody Build
item.description: A look at an outdoor project featuring a K10 Squarebody truck, focusing on restoration details and lifestyle elements behind the build.

item.title: Twins vs Tannerite… chaos ensued
item.description: A look at a outdoor test involving the twins as they try out reactive target material!

item.title: Testing a Cannon That Was Overpowered
item.description: A look at a test where a cannon was built with too much force, explaining what went wrong.

item.title: Reviving Grandpa’s K10 Squarebody
item.description: The twins take on Grandpa’s old K10 Squarebody — what starts as a rough project turns into a fun rebuild filled with memories and mechanical fixes.

item.title: Restoring the Farm by Repairing a Dam
item.description: See how the crew works to rebuild water flow and protect farmland after a damaged dam threatens the property.

item.title: Can a Pistol Trigger Tannerite?
item.description: The twins test a simple target practice theory — exploring safety, curiosity, and learning through responsible outdoor fun.

item.title: Frog Hunting Adventure with a Twist
item.description: While searching for frogs, the twins come across unexpected wildlife near the water — a lighthearted look at outdoor life on the farm.

item.title: Grandpa and Granddaughters Set the Hog Trap
item.description: A fun family day on the farm as Grandpa teaches his twin granddaughters how to set up a safe and humane hog trap.

item.title: $100 Challenge: Family Fun by the Ponds
item.description: Grandpa’s granddaughters take on a lighthearted $100 challenge across four ponds — a family-friendly day full of laughs and outdoor adventure.

item.title: Weekend Plans at the Farm
item.description: The twins share their weekend vibes and invite you to join the conversation — family, outdoors, and plenty of fun under the open sky.

item.title: Twins, Kayaks, and a Surprise on the Water
item.description: A day of fishing takes an unexpected turn as the twins encounter something unusual on the property — handled with good humor and country sense.
